about_the_game:
Original soundtrack of Forever Home. All files are in .mp3 format.
Composed by David Hunt, vocal work by Snowflake, some guitar by Sean Murray.

Songs will be downloaded to the "Forever Home Soundtrack" folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Forever Home\Forever Home Soundtrack

Or through Steam you can right-click on Forever Home and do properties. On the LOCAL FILES tab choose "Browse Local Files..."
